TopicTitle: Forum mobile interface - can it search only within current thread?

Articles.Content:
The adaptive interface lets me search for a specific word in a thread using any browser on a Windows desktop, but I lose that feature on my phone (Android Firefox).

Is this a known problem, and is a fix planned?

@DeadJohn Im just a rank and file user, but i did a quick test from my iphone on the forums home page after seeing your question. I hit the search thing and just put in android firefox into it and your question popped up for me. Fwiw im on iphone, using safari on ios 15.3.1. The search functionality (i may have totally failed to understand you so sorry if im off base) seems to function broad scope for me. Idk if this helps or hinders you. But its my attempt to add data so the tech savvy folks can use it if it helps.

Works for me too, IOS Safari and Netscape.

@AlamoVampire @Gargamel Can you limit your search to just the current thread on a phone or other small browser window, or does the search look at *every* thread? The context is I'm checking a huge thread to see if something's been mentioned before within just that one thread.

The forum disables some search functionality when the screen is narrower than some threshold. I can replicate the issue without even using a phone. Open the forum on Windows, change the browser window size, and at a certain point the search text box gets replaces by a just a search button. The text box allows filtering on "This Topic". The search button does not allow "This Topic" filtering as far as I can see.
